Literature.Title: The antibiotic activity of cationic linear amphipathic peptides: lessons from the action of leucine/lysine copolymers on bacteria of the class Mollicutes.
Literature.Author: Béven L, Castano S, Dufourcq J, Wieslander A, Wróblewski H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acholeplasma laidlawii A-EF22(MIC=25µM),Mycoplasma gallisepticum S6(MIC=50µM),Mycoplasma mycoides ssp. mycoides SC KH3J(MIC=25µM),Spiroplasma citri R8A2(MIC=25µM),Spiroplasma floricola BNR 1(MIC=50µM),Spiroplasma melliferum BC3(MIC=50µM)
